extracted_data.question_text: What is the name and definition of the software business model presented in the article?
extracted_data.extracted_value: Freemium - A business model that combines free and premium versions of a product, where users can access a free version with restricted functionality and a complete version that costs money but has more features and capabilities. It is a mix of the terms 'free' and 'premium'.
